backend/main.mo: Main backend actor providing product CRUD, user and buyer profiles, and authorization checks using access control mixins and role-based permissions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old product records to the new format by adding a default category field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining the warm kirana-inspired palette and mobile-first defaults.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring meta tags, manifest, icons, and bootstrapping the app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, theme colors, icons, and launch configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing network-first caching with offline fallback and cache versioning.
frontend/README-TWA-APK.md: Documentation explaining how to package the PWA into an Android APK using Trusted Web Activity.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the StoreHome page.
frontend/src/components/admin/VendorAcce: Admin UI for granting or revoking vendor access via principal ID with validation and status alerts.
frontend/src/components/buyer/BuyerLogin: Displays buyer login state and provides login/logout actions using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/DailyDealsPriceE: Dialog component allowing vendors to edit daily deal prices with validation and mutation updates.
frontend/src/components/KiranaThemeNotes: Design system notes describing colors, typography, spacing, and component styling for the kirana theme.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorDas: Vendor dashboard showing authorization status and a form to add products with validation and mutations.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorLog: Shows vendor login state and handles login/logout via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/constants/productCategories: Defines product category metadata including labels, icons, and helper lookup functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuyerProfileQuerie: Provides hooks to fetch and save the caller's buyer profile using react-query, with actor and identity-based enabling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication state, identities, and login flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for products, user roles, buyer profiles, and vendor/admin mutations with backend actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useVendorAccess.ts: Evaluates vendor and admin access by querying the caller's role and checking identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useVendorMode.ts: Manages vendor-only UI mode via URL/session parameters with helpers to enable or disable it.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light/dark modes with mobile-friendly defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React, react-query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/StoreHome.tsx: Main store page showing products, vendor controls, and login status with UI for browsing and vendor actions.
frontend/src/utils/actorErrors.ts: Normalizes backend and agent errors into user-friendly messages for common authorization and validation cases.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, container settings, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project state, including category-related features, requirements, and pending requests.
